description:
中国新歌声迎来新一轮的激烈比拼。擅长情歌的郑迦文演唱了一首《Goodbye My Lover》，夺得汪峰战队第一个五强席位！暖男郑迦文带着干净温暖的声音回来啦，一首《Goodbye My Lover》将再度融化温暖你的心。

那英后悔没有选择郑迦文，认为他的进步“令人出乎意料”。哈林惊讶地发现郑迦文音色上比之前多出了“空气感”。作为汪峰“梦之队”的助阵导师，蔡健雅表示郑迦文一开口自己就被征服了，“你赢得了我的心”。

【关于James Blunt】

James Hillier Blount (born 22 February 1974), better known by his stage name James Blunt, is an English singer-songwriter and former reconnaissance officer for the British Army. He originally signed to EMI Music Publishing and is currently signed to Custard Records and Atlantic Records.詹姆斯·布朗特（出生于1974年2月22日），是一位英国唱作人，曾是英国军队的侦查长官。他起初与百代唱片公司签订了合约现在与Custard Records和大西洋唱片公司有合约在身。

Blunt has gone on to sell over 20 million albums and 20 million singles worldwide. He has received several awards, including two Brit Awards, two MTV Video Music Awards, two Ivor Novello Awards as well as receiving five Grammy Award nominations.Blunt迄今为止在全球范围内售出了超过2000万张专辑和超过2000万首歌。他获得了不少奖项，包括两个全英音乐奖，两个MTV音乐奖，两个全英原创音乐奖，以及五个格莱美音乐奖提名。

【关于歌曲】

"Goodbye My Lover" is a song written by English songwriter James Blunt and Sacha Skarbek, for Blunt's debut album Back to Bedlam. It was released as the fourth single in November 2005 and reached the top ten in the United Kingdom, where it became Blunt's second top ten single.《Goodbye My Lover》是英国唱作人James Blunt和Sacha Skarbe共同为Blunt的首张专辑《Back to Bedlam》创作的歌曲。这首歌是专辑的第四首单曲，于2005年11月公开，并且攀升到英国榜单的前十位，这也是Blunt的第二只前十的单曲。

It also reached the top ten in Sweden, Australia and France. In the United States, "Goodbye My Lover" had modest success on the Billboard singles chart, where it reached number 66 on the Billboard Hot 100 due to digital downloads, even though the single was not yet released in the U.S.这首歌在瑞典，澳大利亚和法国也都达到了前十名的位置。在美国，《Goodbye My Lover》也同样获得了不错的成绩，在公告牌百强单曲榜获得了第66名的下载量，即使当时这支单曲还没有在美国公开。
